title: Club to view available languages
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is in edit mode on a player's contract
AND has selected a language from the dropdown
custom_steps: WHEN they click the view button next to the language dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN they should be able to view/pick between available BOC languages followed by available club standard languages for the clause
AND dropdown defaults to first BOC language
AND language viewer follows all Global AC

title: Club flexibility entering details for club/custom language on release clause
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user is in edit mode on a player's contract
AND user has selected a club or custom language from the dropdown in the release clause
custom_expected:
THEN table in the clause updates to the club/custom version
AND all behavior works as described in [C84903](http://10.4.36.21/testrail/index.php?/cases/view/84903)
AND user can save changes
AND the data sources column in https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2347111?projectId=14044 is populated for all fields

title: Club can add Addendum E to contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user is in edit mode in a player's contract
custom_steps:
WHEN they click the 'add section' button according to the button state table
AND clicks 'Addendum E'
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum appears and is auto-toggled to Yes and expanded
AND the section follows all Global AC and [wireframe](http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=addendum_e)

title: Club can add Addendum F to contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has opened a new non-first year contract
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum F is toggled to 'Yes' by default
AND this section is collapsed by default
AND the section follows Global AC, [wireframe](http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=addendum_f) and [button state table](https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2346965?projectId=14044)
AND user is required pick US State from dropdown
AND the dropdown defaults to blank
AND Contract history column is checked

title: Club can add Addendum G to contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum G is applied by default and toggled to YES.
AND The section is collapsed by default
AND It follows [wireframe](http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=addendum_g), Global AC, and [button state table](https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2346965?projectId=14044)
AND Contract History columns is populated

title: Club can add Addendum H to contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks the 'add section' button
custom_expected:
THEN Addendum H can be added
AND it follows [wireframe](http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=addendum_h), Global AC and [button state table](https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2346965?projectId=14044) rules

title: Club can enter Life Insurance Consent section
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
custom_steps:
WHEN they navigate to the 'Life Insurance Consent' section

1. AND selects 'Refused to Sign'

2. AND does not enter 'Date Signed'
custom_expected:
THEN it is mandatory and cannot be removed
AND is collapsed by default
AND it follows [wireframe](http://f2j41d.axshare.com/#p=life_insurance_consent), Global AC and button state table
AND user can pick from radio buttons Signed, Refused to Sign, and Signed but declined to participate
AND 'Signed' is selected by default
AND 'Date Signed' field does not accept invalid file formats

1. THEN 'Date Signed' does not show

2. THEN 'Date Signed' defaults to Signing date if there is one

title: Club can enter comments in contract
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
AND has navigated to the comments section
custom_steps:
WHEN the user types in comments
AND clicks save
custom_expected:
THEN comments are collapsed by default
AND comments are saved with the rest of the contract
AND it follows the [wireframe](http://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=form_comments___boc_notes)

title: Club CANNOT attach files to contracts in Prelimary state
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has created a new non-first year contract
AND has navigated to the attach files section
custom_steps:
WHEN the user expands that section

1. AND moves the contract to a state other than preliminary
custom_expected:
THEN drag and drop/attach buttons are not visible and text reads: 'you cannot attach files until the contract is in a Terms Submitted or Terms Accepted state'
AND Text/styling follows mockup/single C's respectively
AND Club can attach in another state

2. THEN the above text is not displayed

title: Club can delete Preliminary contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is viewing a newly created contract
custom_steps:
1. WHEN the user views the buttons at the bottom

2. WHEN the user saves the preliminary form 

3. WHEN the user clicks the delete button on the form

4. AND clicks yes
custom_expected:
1. THEN there is no delete button at the bottom

2. THEN buttons follow [button state table](https://u8r.jamacloud.com/perspective.req#/items/2346965?projectId=14044) rules

3. THEN delete confirmation message appears following global framework
4. AND contract deletes from player's contract history and anywhere else in the system
AND all associated documents also get deleted
AND user is taken back to point of entry (wherever 'close' button would take them)

title: Club CANNOT create more than one Preliminary contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has a preliminary contract for a player
custom_steps: WHEN user tries to create a new contract
custom_expected: THEN show hard error that follows global error messaging dialogue

title: Club CANNOT create contract for Voluntarily retired players
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is on a 'voluntarily retired' player's profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'create new'
custom_expected: THEN show hard error

title: Club CANNOT create contract for pending Voluntarily retired players
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user pending status is 'voluntarily retired' player's profile
custom_steps: WHEN the user clicks 'create new'
custom_expected: THEN show hard error

title: Show warning if my player requires an Asian Status check to negotiate a contract
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a player with birth country being Taiwan, Japan or South Korea
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks create new
custom_expected: THEN show soft warning

title: Clubs want to enter a Major League Base Salary clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN that club is viewing the addendum b section of a new non-first year minor league contract
custom_steps: WHEN club selects "Yes" on this section
custom_expected: THEN there is a language field and all global ac should be followed

title: Clubs want to enter a Minor League Assignment Salary clause
custom_preconds: GIVEN that club is viewing the addendum b section of a new non-first year minor league contract
custom_steps: WHEN club selects "Yes" on this section
custom_expected:
THEN "Paid" is a required field
AND "Annual" is selected by default
AND there is a language field and all global ac should be followed

title: Club can submit contract terms
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a preliminary contract
AND the contract is in edit mode
custom_steps: WHEN user selects 'terms submitted' from the update status dropdown
custom_expected:
THEN button follows the button table format
AND changes are saved
AND the form is reloaded in view mode
AND blue notification appears after successfully updated
AND status header to show Terms Submitted in green
AND 'Status Last changed, Changed by, Date Submitted and Submitted by' fields in the Status and Dates section are updated
AND contract follows Global AC

title: Club's Terms Submitted contract shows only included clauses
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a contract in the Terms Submitted stage
custom_steps: WHEN the user opens the contract
custom_expected:
THEN contract opens in view mode
AND all Addendums toggled to 'no' are hidden
AND all Add B clauses toggled to 'no' are hidden
AND user can add them back in edit mode

title: Club CANNOT Submit when required fields are missing (except Add B)
custom_preconds: GIVEN A user has contract missing required fields
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to Submit Terms
custom_expected:
THEN show hard errors for each required field that is blank
AND show required fields with a red asterisk
AND zeros and blanks should be treated as not having filled out the field
AND Fields are required within addendums only if that section was toggled to YES
AND the error message also shows the section name
AND errors follow Global AC
AND errors remained pinned to the browser after dismissal

title: Club CANNOT Submit when required fields are missing for Add B
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user has a contract with missing required fields in it's Add B section
custom_steps: WHEN the user tries to Submit Terms
custom_expected:
THEN show hard errors
AND all required fields are marked with red asterisk
AND Fields are required within clauses only if that section was toggled to YES and is shown on the screen
IF multiple rows are entered, only show the required field error once for the column for all rows that are missing a value for that column
AND Zeros and blank spaces should be treated as not having filled the required field
AND contract follows Global AC- each error follows correct messaging

title: Club CANNOT Submit if custom language was selected but not entered
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user has a preliminary contract
AND selected custom language for a clause but left it blank
custom_steps: WHEN user tried to Submit Terms
custom_expected: THEN show hard error

title: Club can know if Player Profile has required fields for contract creation
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is submitting a player's contract
AND the player's profile is missing any one of the following: Telephone, Position, Height, Weight, Batting Hand, Throwing Hand, Place of Birth: City, State, Country
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to submit the contract
custom_expected:
THEN show hard errors
AND show only fields missing from profile

title: Club/BOC know which Add C's count towards Free Agency
custom_preconds: GIVEN a player has a minor contract
custom_steps: WHEN the user check a player's contract history
custom_expected:
THEN the first Add C of each year has a fraction in the FA column where the denominator is the number of years remaining in the minor contract
AND the numerator increases by one for each subsequent year (starting with 1/7 for the first year, 2/7 for the second, etc.)
AND each Add C after the first of the year will not increase the count
AND The first Addendum C that is created in the contract should also be considered for this logic
AND Only include the following states for the logic - Tendered, Pending, Approved. Do NOT include preliminary and Voided Addendum Cs

title: Club know if contract is a successor
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club user wants to continue a player's employment at the end of their contract without them becoming a free agent
AND The signing date is in between the "Successor date From" and "Successor Contract To" dates (system date)
AND The player has a current or previous Minor league contract that will expire this year
AND The player is signing with the same Org
AND The new contract takes effect the following year
custom_steps: WHEN the user creates a new contract for that player
custom_expected:
THEN field: "Successor Contract" in Addendum A contract is populated
AND This field is set to 'Yes' by system if conditions are met. Otherwise, it is 'No'
IF Signing date is not yet populated, calculate using today's date as Signing date
